name: Karen Simmons
what_you_do: Karen Simmons is the founder of Autism Today, an online information and resource center for autism.
who_you_serve: Parents, educators, doctors, therapists, and others who service the autism and special needs community.
social_proof: Karen Simmons is the author of 14 books, has hosted 73 conferences including the World Autism Summit, and was the Internet Entrepreneur of the Year through Multiple Streams of Income in 2003.
signature_programs: Autism Today, Keen Education Foundation, World Autism Summit
business_focus: Providing information, resources, and support for the autism and special needs community.
service_provided: Online information, resources, conferences, books, coaching
